name: Skin-So-Soft Body Pads
description: Here’s your best friend for exfoliating dead skin cells so that your skin looks brighter and more even toned.-AVON

name: Skin So Soft Original Body Lotion
description: Get skin softer than ever with Skin So Soft Original Body Lotion. -AVON

name: Men's Earth and Sky Bracelet
description: The focal point of this beaded bracelet is the genuine sodalite and tiger’s eye stones in a naturally charming earth tone palette. -AVON

name: Mesmrize Cologne Spray
description: Reveal your mysterious side with this captivating men’s fragrance that features a hypnotic blend of warm and intoxicating notes. 3.4 fl. oz. - AVON

name: Wild Country Aftershave Splash
description: Make a splash with an aftershave in our best-selling scent. It leaves skin feeling smooth after shaving and lightly fragranced with the woody, earthy scent of Wild Country. 4 fl. oz. - AVON

name: Black Suede Roll-On Antiperspriant Deodorant
description: The fresh and aromatic fusion of notes in Black Suede make it always a classic. The fragranced antiperspirant is non-whitening, quick drying and anti-staining as it glides on smoothly for long-lasting odor protection. - AVON
